price: 29. Loba: Mokolo mwa elonga mokosalisaka bapengwi te na bondimi bwa bango, mpe bakotikelaka bango tango te.
arabic: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul yawma al-fatḥi lā yanfaʿu alladhīna kafarū īmānuhum walā hum yunẓarūna
